definition: to donate/to give/to grant/to distribute/to administer
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: Plants are designed to give in balanced giving and receiving with the land.
sentences.chinese: 塔罗树是设计来与土地一起平衡施与受的。

sentences.english: The living need charity more than the dead.
sentences.chinese: 生者比死者需要更多的施与。

sentences.english: You can't give to others when you're empty inside.
sentences.chinese: 当你内心空虚的时候，你便无法施与他人。

sentences.english: There are those who give with joy, and that joy is their reward.
sentences.chinese: 有人喜乐地施与，那喜乐就是他们的酬报。

sentences.english: If South Georgia has a special dispensation, it is this river of krill.
sentences.chinese: 南乔治亚有一种特殊的施与，它是磷虾的河流。

sentences.english: They give as in yonder valley the myrtle breathes its fragrance into space.
sentences.chinese: 他们施与，就像山谷那边的桃金娘散发芳香。

sentences.english: Giving is more blessed than receiving.
sentences.chinese: 能施与的人，比受施的人更有福。

sentences.english: The hardware store humanely trapped the squirrels and set them free outside town.
sentences.chinese: 五金店捕捉到松鼠后，施与怜悯将它们在镇外释放了。

sentences.english: To give is better than to receive.
sentences.chinese: 能施与的人，比受施的人更有福。

sentences.english: Give with no expectation of getting something in return, and it becomes a purer, more beautiful act.
sentences.chinese: 施与时不要祈求回报，这样你的善行就更纯净美好。

sentences.english: Give people more than they expect ahd do it cheerfully .
sentences.chinese: 施与别人尽可能多的东西，并要欣然而为之。

sentences.english: Li and Leong have been secretly dating for a year and a half.
sentences.chinese: 21岁的梁洛施与42岁的李泽楷已秘密拍拖1年半。

definition: variant of 施與|施与[shi1 yu3]
to give charity to sb/to oblige
to give in charity/to give alms (to the poor)
to do good works/to be merciful
variant of 賜予|赐予[ci4 yu3]
deficient/to let sb down/to cause sb suffering
to confer a favor on sb/to confer a benefit
